CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.Name = 'Sales' && ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), ARR__c , IF( RecordType.Name = 'Upsell' && ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), ARR__c , IF( RecordType.Name = 'Renewal' && ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Lost'), -ARR_Up_For_Renewal_C3__c, IF( RecordType.Name = 'Renewal' && ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), IF( ARR__c - ARR_Up_For_Renewal_C3__c > 0, ARR__c - ARR_Up_For_Renewal_C3__c, IF( ARR__c - ARR_Up_For_Renewal_C3__c < 0, ARR__c - ARR_Up_For_Renewal_C3__c, 0 ) ), NULL ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Revenue Movement ARR (C3)
